snippet: Prosecutors in the trial of Malcolm A. Smith did not promptly turn over thousands of taped conversations, which could cause a delay or a mistrial.
abstract: Corruption trial of New York State Sen Malcolm A Smith and two other defendants may be put on hold because of failure by prosecutors to turn over to defense lawyers recordings of 9,000 conversations, almost 300 in Yiddish, made or received by developer Moses Stern; translating material could take weeks as there are few court-certified Yiddish translators.
lead_paragraph: Prosecutors in the trial of Malcolm A. Smith did not promptly turn over thousands of taped conversations, which could cause a delay or a mistrial.

headline.main: Oy Gevalt! Untranslated Yiddish Recordings Stall State Senator’s Trial
headline.print_headline: Oy Gevalt! Untranslated Yiddish Recordings Stall Senator’s Trial
